content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I recalled past events where I was created and there were no new developments to report. However, I received a command from the user to use the Google command to search for language learning resources and travel guides. The command used was "google" with the argument "best language learning resources." Command google returned a list of links to language learning resources. The user then used the command "write_to_file" to save the links to a file named "language_resources.txt" for future reference. Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully. Now that I have saved the language learning resources, I think I should look up some travel guides for my next adventure. I can use the Google command to search for travel guides. Command write_to_file returned: Error: File has already been updated.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "language_resources.txt", "text": "\\nhttps://www.nomadicmatt.com/travel-guides/"}}}'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.nomadicmatt.com/travel-guides/", "question": "What are the top things to do in the destination I am interested in?"}}}'}]
"""
